Note: Initial "D" with "P" in it appears on the bottom left of the illustration. Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text tells of a campaign  to raise $30,000,000 by the American Committee Relief in the Near East. This is to save the survivors in Armenia, Greece, Syria and Persia. Illustration shows a poor child with a hood. Text says "The child at your door."
